title: IWG plc
summary: IWG plc, formerly Regus, is a British holding company.[2] Its provides serviced offices under several brand-names, including Regus.[3] It was started in Brussels, Belgium, by Mark Dixon in 1989.[4] It is registered in Saint Helier, Jersey, and has its head office in Zug, Switzerland.[3] It is listed on the London Stock Exchange and is a constituent of the FTSE 250 Index.[5]
